H0.text: Capable of reproducing by meiosis is the greatest benefit of sexual reproduction.

H1.text: The ability to reproduce without a mate is the greatest benefit of sexual reproduction.

H2.text: The ability to produce genetically different offspring is the greatest benefit of sexual reproduction.

H3.text: Capable of producing offspring genetically identical to parent is the greatest benefit of sexual reproduction.

A4.text: Sexual reproduction increases genetic diversity and impedes the accumulation of harmful genetic mutations.

A5.text: In order to reproduce sexually, both males and females need to find a mate.
